title: Update Yes-click success message and add kiss shower animation

requirements.text: When the user clicks the "Yes" button, update the success state content to display the exact message: "I love you Motu, Tu mera pyaara baccha h" as the primary (most prominent) success message.

quotes: When she clicks 'Yes' , show the message "I love you Motu, Tu mera pyaara baccha h"

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Yes" button transitions to the success state.
The success state prominently displays the exact text: "I love you Motu, Tu mera pyaara baccha h" (matching capitalization and punctuation).

requirements.text: Add a celebratory "lots of kisses" animation that plays when the user clicks "Yes" (e.g., a kiss-mark/lip-print particle shower that spawns many kiss elements and animates them across the screen without blocking interaction).

quotes: And give animation for lots of kisses.

acceptanceCriteria: After clicking "Yes", a visible animation of many kiss elements appears on the screen (not just a single icon).
The kiss animation is animated (movement + fade/scale) and feels celebratory/dense (i.e., clearly "lots" of kisses).
The animation does not cause page scrollbars or layout shifts (page remains stable and usable).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (including Internet Identity and actor hooks, and shadcn/ui source components).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication flows or backend APIs.
Do not change the existing "No" button evasive behavior.
